feed.title: Track Awesome Pokemon Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: :video_game: A curated list of awesome Pokémon & Pokémon Go resources, tools and more.

entry.title: Awesome Pokemon Updates on Nov 11, 2024
entry.content:
Development Projects / Miscellaneous

  • PokemonRedExperiments (⭐7.4k) - Playing Pokémon Red with Reinforcement Learning.

entry.title: Awesome Pokemon Updates on Apr 13, 2022
entry.content:
Resources & Others / Communities

  • Pokémon GO Raiders Discord - A Discord community for raid hosting and joining with discussions about Pokémon GO.

Resources & Others / Others

  • PVPoke - A PVP ranking and moveset for Pokémon GO.
  • Pokémon GO Calender - Pokémon GO calender events with Google Calendar and timezones support.
  • Poke Genie - A free raid hosting and joining app for iOS & Android with PVP functionalities.

entry.title: Awesome Pokemon Updates on Aug 16, 2016
entry.content:
Development Projects / APIs

  • PokemonGO-Pokedex (⭐130) - Pokédex of Pokémon GO in JSON.

Development Projects / Bots

  • PokeBuddy (⭐443) - A Pokémon GO bot.

Development Projects / Miscellaneous

  • PokemonGO-IV-Renamer (⭐86) - Automatically renames your Pokémon to their IV stats.

Resources & Others / Maps

  • iPokeGo (⭐644) - A native iOS client to map the Pokémon around you.

Resources & Others / Wiki

  • GamePress
  • Pokémon Go Info

Resources & Others / Others

  • InfoSpreadsheet - Datamined info about Pokémon GO species with IV calculations.
  • InfoSpreadsheet#2 - Pokémon GO species data with their movesets.

entry.title: Awesome Pokemon Updates on Aug 08, 2016
entry.content:
Development Projects / Miscellaneous

  • pokemongo-genymotion (⭐19) - Play Pokémon GO from your Genymotion device.

entry.title: Awesome Pokemon Updates on Aug 07, 2016
entry.content:
Development Projects / Miscellaneous

  • alfred-pokedex (⭐24) - Alfred 3 workflow to lookup information about Pokémon.

entry.title: Awesome Pokemon Updates on Aug 06, 2016
entry.content:
Development Projects / Bots

  • Poketrainer (⭐119) - A fast and feature filled bot in Python.

Development Projects / Miscellaneous

  • pogo-optimizer (⭐502) - Shows you the IVs and information necessary to determine which Pokémon get ground into candy.

Resources & Others / Maps

  • PokemonGo-Map (⭐7.5k) - Live visualization of all the Pokémon in your area and more.
  • PokemonGo-DesktopMap (⭐1.8k) - Electron app for Pokémon GO that shows Pokémon nearby.

Resources & Others / Tips & Tricks

  • Mashable - How to be the best, least annoying, Pokémon GO trainer.

entry.title: Awesome Pokemon Updates on Aug 05, 2016
entry.content:
Development Projects / APIs

  • PokeAPI (⭐4.8k) - A RESTful API for Pokémon (http://pokeapi.co/).
  • pgoapi (⭐1.4k) - Pokémon GO API lib/demo.
  • Pokemon-GO-node-api (⭐879) - Pokémon GO API Node.js library.
  • Pokemon-Go-Rocket-API (⭐366) - Client API library for Pokémon GO in C#.
  • Pokemon GO Java API (⭐1k) - Pokémon GO API for Java.
  • Pokemon Name API (⭐499) - Get a list of Pokémon names in JSON.

Development Projects / Apps

  • iPokeMon (⭐429) - Pokémon like game on iOS with Location Based Service.
  • pokemon-online (⭐297) - Online Pokémon Battle Simulator.

Development Projects / Bots

  • slack-pokemon (⭐341) - A bot for having Pokémon battles in Slack.
  • PokeSlack (⭐38) - Alerts you of nearby Pokémon.
  • TwitchPlaysPokemon (⭐111) - A bot mimicking Twitch Plays Pokémon.
  • PokemonGoBot (⭐559) - Bot that plays Pokémon GO.

Development Projects / Miscellaneous

  • Pokemon-Go-Controller (⭐2.5k) - Play Pokémon GO safely or at unavailable area.
  • pokemon-go-mitm-node (⭐486) - Pokémon GO MITM Proxy.
  • PokeMMO (⭐740) - WebGL Pokémon MMO Engine with Realtime Editor.
  • PoGoTools (⭐5) - A set of CLI tools for getting IVs, transferring Pokémon, evolving Pokémon, and trashing items.
  • slack-pokemon-emoji (⭐21) - A tool to upload all the Pokémon to Slack emoji.

Resources & Others / Communities

  • /r/pokemongo - Pokémon GO Subreddit.
  • /r/pokemongodev - Reverse engineering game/API.
  • RazerGo - Localized Pokémon GO chat.
  • PokeDates - The first-ever Pokémon GO dating service.

Resources & Others / Maps

  • pokelocater (⭐130) - Display Pokémon nearby your location on a map.
  • Pokemap (⭐1k) - A native Android client to map the Pokémon around you.
  • Poke Vision - Find Pokémon by location.

Resources & Others / Tips & Tricks

  • TechCrunch - 13 ways to be better at Pokémon GO.
  • Imore - Pokémon GO: 21 tips, tricks, and cheats to be the best trainer in the world.
  • Heavy - Pokémon GO: 10 Cheats, Tip & Tricks You Need to Know.

Resources & Others / Others

  • Silphroad - Pokémon GO tools & reference charts.
  • Server Status - Shows you if Pokémon GO is down.
  • Egg Statistics - Pokémon GO Egg Reporter.
  • Poke Assistant - Collection of calculators for Pokémon GO.

entry.title: Awesome Pokemon Updates on Jul 20, 2016
entry.content:
Development Projects / Miscellaneous

  • pokecrystal (⭐2.2k) - Disassembly of Pokémon Crystal.
  • x-pokemon (⭐89) - A web component to display Pokémon.
  • pokered (⭐4.3k) - Disassembly of Pokémon Red/Blue.
  • pokemon-reverse-engineering-tools (⭐340) - Tools for compiling and disassembling Pokémon Red and Pokémon Crystal.
